This entire lion story is full of shit. they have 6 or by now several more versions of this story whats next the dr drove the lion off the game reserve. Dam the lion suffering for 40 hours after a bad bow shot. must have been a toy arrow. all my hunting arrows are such that if i were to not make a clean kill the animal will not last the rest of that day, but a bad shot and they kept making the animal follow them does not fly. it would have bled to death a lot sooner.. Have to give this dr credit he had balls use an arrow on big game hunt not me i want to be dam sure the animal goes down and stays no chance to become enraged from being wounded.
